alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:31PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Deschutes County through 500 PM PDT... At 431 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Millican, or 18 miles northeast of La Pine, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millican. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands
